mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.contract_id AS "contractId", a.watermeth_code AS "watermethCode", a.watermeth_name AS "watermethName", a.watermeth_univalent AS "watermethUnivalent", a.ext_field1 AS "extField1", a.ext_field2 AS "extField2", a.ext_field3 AS "extField3", a.remark AS "remark"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contract_sales_watermeth( id, contract_id, watermeth_code, watermeth_name, watermeth_univalent, ext_field1, ext_field2, ext_field3, remark ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contractId}, #{watermethCode}, #{watermethName}, #{watermethUnivalent}, #{extField1}, #{extField2}, #{extField3}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: UPDATE contract_sales_watermeth SET contract_id = #{contractId}, watermeth_code = #{watermethCode}, watermeth_name = #{watermethName}, watermeth_univalent = #{watermethUnivalent}, ext_field1 = #{extField1}, ext_field2 = #{extField2}, ext_field3 = #{extField3}, remark = #{remark} WHERE id = #{id}
